name: 陳柏端
objective:
本課程之學習內容包含：(a) 一階常微分方程式 (ODEs)、(b) 二階線性微分方程式、(c) 複變函數、(d) 線性代數：矩陣、向量與行列式、(e) 級數及傅立葉級數、(f) Laplace 轉換。
The learning content of this course includes:: (a) First-Order Ordinary Differential Equations (ODEs), (b) Second-Order Linear ODEs, (c) Complex function, (d) Linear Algebra: Matrices, Vectors, Determinants, (e) Series and Fourier series, (f) Laplace Transforms
schedule:
1		Review of calculus	
2		Review of calculus	
3		First order ordinary differential equation	
4		First order ordinary differential equation	
5		First order ordinary differential equation	
6		Midterm	30%
7		Second order ordinary differential equation	
8		Second order ordinary differential equation	
9		Second order ordinary differential equation 	
10		Systems of linear equation	
11		Systems of linear equation	
12		Midterm	30%
13		High order ordinary differential equation	
14		Power series 	
15		Power series	
16		Laplace transform to solve ODE	
17		Laplace transform to solve ODE	
18		Final exam	30%
scorePolicy:
三次考試各佔 30%
平時表現佔 10%
consultation: Office hour 為星期二下午 1 點至 6 點。
remarks: 遠距教學使用 Google Meethttps://meet.google.com/yjw-hwdq-qyw
